resources.string: Choose your option and select images to identify the issue
select the text for your problem.
Is this pothole Covered in water? i.e. Is it difficult for people to recognize this pothole?
please select the picture which best describe the size of debris and how much area it is covering?
please enter your vehicle Number and when it gone missing?

please select the picture which best describe the size of garbage and how much area it is covering?
Is this Broken pole blocking the half road or full road? please select the correct picture.

How wide is the road on which this issue exist? Please select the option which best describes the road size
is this manhole overflowing with water or not? Please select the appropriate option.
Select the location where you have started the planting campaign.
Please create the schedule to water plant? we will notify you and nearby user at that time.
